string.name: what_s_new_toast
string.font:
- Added French translation. 
 - Modernized player console with fresh visuals and responsive animations. 
 - Intuitive video gestures: swipe to seek, double-tap skip, brightness & volume controls. 
 - Acrylic background effect with blurred artwork for a sleek look. 
 - Sleep timer and playback speed fully implemented with new dialogs. 
 - Playing Queue screen added with shuffle, clear, and skip-to-track actions. 
 - Official Media3 PlayerView integration replacing custom implementation. 
 - "Like" button to favourite tracks, synced with playlists. 
 - Improved chronometer and progress handling for unknown durations. 
 - Refined layouts with ConstraintLayout and TwoPane support. 
 - Updated "What's New" section and changelog entries.

item.font:
We've enhanced the functionality of the app. 
 We're utilizing the new, advanced NowPlaying API for real-time updates regarding playback metadata state. 
 We've added a new Dynamic Widget that automatically adjusts to size. 
 More App Widget styles are coming soon.
